short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly discover, save, and organize top-performing eCommerce emails from a vast, curated library.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Maillibr Chrome Extension lets you effortlessly import emails into your library. Ditch Gmail labels and faulty forwards. Store inspirational sources and competitor emails easily in your private collections on the Maillibr platform (your go-to place for inspiration - browse more than 5.000 hand-picked emails).

Who Needs It:

- Marketers seeking inspiration for their next email campaign.
- E-commerce professionals aiming to analyze and collect high-converting email templates.
- Designers looking for current trends in email aesthetics.
- Email copywriters curating examples of compelling copy.
- Agency owners providing email marketing services to clients.

Capabilities:

✓ Save Emails Instantly. Directly save any email from Gmail into your Maillibr collections with a single click.
✓ Organize Your Inspiration. Create and manage your email collections without leaving your inbox.

How to use:

1. Head over to maillibr.com and create an account (it's 100% free).
2. Install this Chrome extension.
3. Sign in to your account.
4. Go to your inbox (supported email providers are currently Gmail and Outlook).
5. Open an email you want to save.
6. Click on the extension and save the email to an existing or new collection.
7. Find your saved email carefully stored in your Maillibr collection on our platform.
